snippet: Mr. de Blasio described the 62-minute meeting at Trump Tower with the president-elect, with whom he has a history of vitriol, as respectful, substantive and “very candid.”...
abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio meets with Pres-elect Donald J Trump to discuss immigration, policing, taxation and other concerns; strategists suggest Trump agreed to encounter with Democratic mayor given fact that de Blasio's decisions can affect large number of Trump's city properties.
lead_paragraph: Mr. de Blasio described the 62-minute meeting at Trump Tower with the president-elect, with whom he has a history of vitriol, as respectful, substantive and “very candid.”

headline.main: ‘The Ball’s in His Court,’ Mayor de Blasio Says After Meeting With Trump
headline.print_headline: Trump Meets De Blasio (Although Not at 20 Paces)
